title: Champion Men's Joggers, Powerblend, Fleece Joggers, Comfortable Sweatpants for Men (Reg. or Big & Tall)
description: THE FIT - Standard-fit men's joggers have a 31” inseam. Elastic waistband with an adjustable drawcord ensures a fit that feels good.
THE FEEL - Made with a midweight, 9 oz. fleece that’s brushed on the interior for comfort.
THE LOOK - Classic men's jogger silhouette gets you from workout to weekend with versatility. Side pockets keep essentials close.
LOW PILL, LOW SHRINK - High-quality fleece fabrication designed to reduce pilling and shrinkage.
SPOT THE C - Iconic C logo hits at the hip of these men's sweatpants.
THE POWERBLEND COLLECTION - A powerhouse fabric blend that’s made for the daily with a stay-true fit and comfort that never quits.
Champion Men'S Joggers, Powerblend, Fleece Joggers, Comfortable Sweatpants For Men (Reg. Or Big & Tall)
